item.title: Write My Code For Me
item.description: Permalink –Â writemycode.net In the spirit of a very similar blog post, I decided to expand upon a specific area of that article… Consider a question like this: I want to do this. Create 10000 files, (filename can be just combination of time and random number). File size should be 4k. And I want to time this. say how many seconds it will take. How can I do this on bash?
